description:
Apparently this error 
	QSocketNotifier: Can only be used with threads started with QThread
is because Wayland isnt supported yet. Perhaps the dependencies are not set correctly?

Its wonderful to use the gambas for rapid appilcation development. easy and convenient iterface for the migrators from VB. In ubuntu 20.04 LTS, installation was successful but on running it says failed to load gb.form.print . Devepoers pls give attention to this issue.

In ubunto 20.04 LTS the gambas3 component gb.form.print is not installed. This means the program fails to start. To correct this, install the missing component with the following:

sudo apt-get install gambas3-gb-form-print

This worked for me.
summary: Love the app, need to install missing component for it to start

description: If you have segfault with fedora 32, try run: gambas3 --platform xcb

Downloaded into Ubuntu 20.04. Install runs, no errors. Clicking the icon gets you a waiting cursor.. then nothing. No Gambus, no errors, nothing. Installing manually from website does the same thing.
Installed in ubuntu 18.04 with any error, but not launching.
It only charge but doesn't works.
It doesn't run at all!
This works just fine, install package "gambas3-gb-form-print" by hand and the program launches.

description: It's does'nt unistall
Not much to say except EXCELLENT

On ubuntu 20.04, ubuntu team seems to forgot to add dependencies so the gambas3 ide won't open after installation. In order to make it work you need to run these command:

sudo apt-get -y install gambas3 gambas3-gb-form-print gambas3-gb-gtk-opengl gambas3-gb-gtk3 gambas3-gb-gui-opengl gambas3-gb-gui-qt gambas3-gb-gui-qt-webkit gambas3-gb-gui-trayicon gambas3-gb-libxml
gambas3-gb-option gambas3-gb-report gambas3-gb-sdl gambas3-gb-sdl-sound gambas3-gb-v4l gambas3-templates gambas3-gb-qt5 gambas3-gb-qt5-ext gambas3-gb-qt5-opengl gambas3-gb-qt5-webkit

Source: https://forum.gambas.one/viewtopic.php?t=894
summary: Need additional dependencies install to make it works
